document_data.name: Tempus Blackthorne
document_data.mainbody: '''Tempus Blackthorne''' was a [[human]] [[wizard]] of [[Zhentil Keep]] and worshiper of [[Bane]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{cite book/Shadowdale/MMP (1989)}}
document_data.Activities:
Tempus was a powerful wizard of Zhentil Keep and a member of the [[church of Bane]]. He was fiercely devoted to his god, aiding him in all matters of mortal life.

Tempus was a childhood friend of [[Ronglath Knightsbridge]] and tried to help his friend.{{cite book/Shadowdale/MMP (1989)|99-100|5}}
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1358}}, Tempus died trying to perform a [[spell]] under the orders of his god but the instability of the magic during the [[Time of Troubles]] killed him. Strangely for him, Bane fondly recalled the mage after his demise.{{cite book/Shadowdale/MMP (1989)|251-253|12}}
